name: Cars Games For Learning 1 2 3
description:
Vehicles are everywhere you look, and if you want to know about all the different cars, trucks, boats, and planes then it’s time for some vehicle fun with the Car Games for Learning 123 App! This educational and entertaining app was designed by teachers with over 15 years childcare experience, using their philosophy of learning through play. With over 40 vehicle flashcards including the sound the vehicle makes, and an ABC book with cool facts, this app will get everyone thrilled to learn about transportation!

Driving Game
Hop into a vehicle and have a blast driving and jumping! With 6 different vehicles including a race car, tractor, mail truck, construction truck, school bus and a car that drives in the night there is tons of fun for little drivers. And the best part is each vehicle is collecting different educational items as they drive which encourages learning through play! For example the race car collects numbers and when you collect all 50 the reward is counting along from 1 to 50, and the tractor collects shapes on the farm and when you collect them all you can tap and hear all the names of the shapes. And of course there is the alphabet also, when the dump truck drives he collects letters and when you collect them all you get to say the ABC's. It's an interactive and fun way to learn shapes, numbers, and the alphabet!

Vehicle Flashcards
If you love vehicles and transportation then delve into the vehicle sounds flashcards! With over 40 different interactive flashcards you’ll learn about cars, trucks, and all other modes of transport including a hot air balloon and a spaceship. And not only will you hear the name you will also hear the sound each vehicle makes, so it’s more enriching and fun!

ABC Transportation Book
This entertaining and educational ABC book is sure to delight all vehicle lovers, and everyone that wants to know more about transportation! Each interactive page features a letter so you will hear the sound of the letter and the word it starts with. Studies have shown that this kind of associated letter recognition is the key to starting to read and essential for learning the ABC’s. The last page of the book features the entire alphabet to further enhance letter recognition, and it also has the traditional ABC song as well!

And along with learning the alphabet each of the 26 vehicles also have a fact that you tap to hear. These facts are very interesting and informative, and will keep you interested with each vehicle. It’s a fun and easy way to learn more about transportation and vehicles!

Beep your horn and sound the sirens of fun when you delve into the Car Games for Learning 123 App, where learning through play encourages everyone to have fun with flashcards while sharpening their knowledge about vehicles and transportation!
